layers.visual_etymology: A nose pointing at itself - when you point at yourself, you touch your nose!
layers.pithy_formula: A nose commands 'DZIH!' pointing sharply at oneself.

characters.story: When someone asks 'Who did this?' you point at your NOSE and command 'ZÌ!' - MYSELF! That sharp fourth tone is the proud declaration of taking responsibility. The nose IS the self in Chinese culture - you always point at your nose to say 'me'!

bizarreness.sensory: Finger tapping nose, proud chest puffing, confident stance
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The nose has a tiny 'I did it!' badge pinned to it
bizarreness.action: Nose growing slightly larger with pride like reverse Pinocchio

similar_warning.difference: 自 has an extra stroke on top (pointing finger); 白 is simpler

layers.visual_etymology: A sun so bright it bleaches everything WHITE - pure light!
layers.pithy_formula: A bleaching sun asks 'Buy? Why so blindingly white?'

characters.story: The sun burns so hot it bleaches everything WHITE! It asks curiously with a rising tone: 'Bái? Why is everything losing color around me?' That questioning second tone rises like steam from sun-bleached bones in the desert!

bizarreness.sensory: Blinding light, bleach smell, hot dry air
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The sun is accidentally washing the world in a giant washing machine
bizarreness.action: Colors fleeing and hiding from the intense whiteness

similar_warning.difference: 白 is simpler; 自 has extra stroke on top

layers.visual_etymology: One (一) above white (白) - one hundred white things lined up!
layers.pithy_formula: One hundred whites whisper 'Bǎi...' in contemplation.

characters.story: ONE (一) sits atop WHITE (白), and below are a HUNDRED white sheep to count. You whisper 'Bǎi...' softly, that third tone dipping as you drowsily count them: one hundred sheep... The repetition is meditative, contemplative, sleep-inducing...

bizarreness.sensory: Soft wool, counting rhythm, droopy eyelids
bizarreness.absurd_detail: Each of the hundred sheep wears a number on its back
bizarreness.action: Jumping over a fence one by one in slow motion

layers.visual_etymology: White (白) plus seven (七) - seven ingredients make white soap!
layers.pithy_formula: White soap commands 'DZOW!' scrubbing dirt away sharply.

characters.story: SOAP is WHITE (白) because it's made of SEVEN (七) pure ingredients! It COMMANDS 'ZÀO!' sharply as it scrubs dirt away. That falling fourth tone is the aggressive scrubbing action - DZOW! DZOW! DZOW! - attacking grime without mercy!

bizarreness.sensory: Lavender soap smell, bubbles popping, squeaky clean skin
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The soap bar has tiny fists punching dirt particles
bizarreness.action: Bubbles forming an army that attacks grime

layers.visual_etymology: An arrow piercing through the exact center of a target!
layers.pithy_formula: An arrow sings 'JOONG!' hitting the middle bullseye.

characters.story: An arrow flies straight through the MIDDLE of the target (口) and the crowd SINGS 'ZHŌNG!' in a high, sustained cheer! BULLSEYE! Right in the CENTER! That first tone rings out like a gong celebrating perfect aim - JOONG!

bizarreness.sensory: Arrow thwack, crowd roar, target vibrating
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The arrow wears a tiny gold medal for hitting the exact center
bizarreness.action: Bullseye exploding with confetti and fireworks

layers.visual_etymology: Ten (十) with a slant - ten times a hundred equals a THOUSAND!
layers.pithy_formula: A thousand marchers sing 'CHYEEN!' in sustained chorus.

characters.story: A THOUSAND soldiers march together, and they SING 'QIĀN!' in a high, sustained chorus that echoes across the valley! The slanted stroke is their tilted spears, the cross their formation. That first tone carries across a THOUSAND voices!

bizarreness.absurd_detail: Each soldier is exactly one thousand steps from home
bizarreness.action: Spears tilting in unison like a wave across the army

similar_warning.difference: 千 has slanted top stroke; 干 has flat horizontal top

layers.visual_etymology: A tongue (千) sticking out of a mouth (口) - the thousand things it can taste!
layers.pithy_formula: A tongue asks 'SHUH? What flavor is this?' curiously.

characters.story: Your TONGUE (千) sticks out of your MOUTH (口) and asks curiously: 'Shé? What is this flavor?' That rising second tone is the tongue's perpetual curiosity - always questioning, always tasting, always wondering 'what's next?'

bizarreness.sensory: Sour lemon taste, papery texture, saliva flowing
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The tongue wears a tiny detective hat investigating flavors
bizarreness.action: Licking the air like a snake sampling scents

layers.visual_etymology: Strokes rising upward - like liquid rising in a measuring cup to one LITER!
layers.pithy_formula: A liter sings 'SHUNG!' rising cheerfully to the top.

characters.story: Watch the liquid RISE in the measuring cup, singing 'SHĒNG!' in a high, sustained note as it climbs to exactly one LITER! That first tone stays high and steady - just like the water level rising smoothly to the top mark!

bizarreness.sensory: Liquid gurgling, glass cup cold, waterline creeping up
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The liquid has tiny legs climbing the inside of the cup
bizarreness.action: Celebrating with a tiny flag when reaching the 1L mark

similar_warning.difference: 升 is simpler; 昇 adds 日 (sun) for 'sun rising'

layers.visual_etymology: Sun (日) plus rise (升) - the sun RISING UP at dawn!
layers.pithy_formula: The sun sings 'SHUNG!' rising majestically at dawn.

characters.story: The SUN (日) RISES UP (升) at dawn, singing 'SHĒNG!' in a high, sustained note of glory! This is the formal, poetic way to describe rising - the sun's majestic ascent. That first tone climbs like the sun itself!

bizarreness.sensory: Golden rays, warmth spreading, morning dew evaporating
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The sun is on an escalator, waving to the stars as they leave
bizarreness.action: Clouds parting like curtains for a grand entrance

similar_warning.difference: 昇 adds 日 (sun) for celestial rising; 升 is the basic form

layers.visual_etymology: A round shape with a dot - a PILL with medicine inside!
layers.pithy_formula: A round pill asks 'WAHN? Why must you swallow me?'

characters.story: The little round PILL sits in your palm and asks with rising curiosity: 'Wán? Why must you swallow me?' That second tone rises like your reluctance to take medicine. The dot inside is the bitter medicine core!

bizarreness.sensory: Bitter taste anticipated, pill rolling in palm, water ready
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The pill has tiny eyes looking up at you pleadingly
bizarreness.action: Trying to roll away from your mouth

similar_warning.difference: 丸 has a dot inside (medicine); 九 is open (empty hook)

layers.visual_etymology: The crack pattern on oracle bones used for DIVINATION!
layers.pithy_formula: A cracked bone whispers 'Bǔ...' revealing the future softly.

characters.story: The oracle bone CRACKS and whispers 'Bǔ...' in a low, mysterious third tone. Ancient priests heated bones until they cracked, then read the patterns for DIVINATION. That dipping tone is the whisper of fate itself, soft and cryptic!

bizarreness.sensory: Burning bone smell, fire crackling, smoky cave
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The crack forms a tiny fortune cookie message
bizarreness.action: Smoke swirling into shapes that tell the future

layers.visual_etymology: Mouth (口) speaking divination (卜) - to TELL FORTUNES aloud!
layers.pithy_formula: A mouth commands 'JAHN!' proclaiming your fortune sharply.

characters.story: The fortune teller's MOUTH (口) reads the DIVINATION (卜) and COMMANDS 'ZHÀN!' sharply - proclaiming your fate! That falling fourth tone is the definitive declaration: your future is DECIDED! No questioning, no negotiating - the fortune has spoken!

bizarreness.sensory: Crystal ball glow, incense thick, dramatic pause before revelation
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The fortune teller's mouth floats separately from their face
bizarreness.action: Lightning striking as the fortune is proclaimed

layers.visual_etymology: A line with something pointing UP above it - ABOVE!
layers.pithy_formula: An arrow commands 'SHAHNG!' pointing sharply upward.

characters.story: An arrow points ABOVE the baseline and COMMANDS 'SHÀNG!' sharply - GO UP! That falling fourth tone is a drill sergeant ordering you to climb, ascend, rise! The small stroke reaches UP above the line, showing the direction clearly!

bizarreness.sensory: Elevator ding, vertigo feeling, wind from below
bizarreness.absurd_detail: A tiny drill sergeant stands on the line yelling 'UP! UP!'
bizarreness.action: Arrow physically lifting you off the ground

similar_warning.difference: 上 points up; 下 points down (mirror images)

layers.visual_etymology: A line with something pointing DOWN below it - BELOW!
layers.pithy_formula: An arrow commands 'SHYAH!' pointing sharply downward.

characters.story: An arrow points BELOW the baseline and COMMANDS 'XIÀ!' sharply - GO DOWN! That falling fourth tone plunges just like the direction itself. The stroke reaches DOWN below the line, diving toward the ground!

bizarreness.sensory: Stomach dropping, descent feeling, ground rushing up
bizarreness.absurd_detail: A tiny parachuter jumps off the line screaming 'DOWN!'
bizarreness.action: Arrow drilling into the earth like a missile

similar_warning.difference: 下 points down; 上 points up (mirror images)

layers.visual_etymology: Stuck between above (上) and below (下) - a CARD jammed in the middle!
layers.pithy_formula: A card whispers 'Kǎ...' stuck between up and down.

characters.story: A CARD is stuck between ABOVE (上) and BELOW (下), and it sighs 'Kǎ...' in a low, frustrated third tone. It can't go up, can't go down - completely BLOCKED! That dipping tone is the defeated sound of being stuck!

bizarreness.sensory: Paper crumpling, pressure from both sides, claustrophobic
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The card has tiny arms pushing against both directions
bizarreness.action: Wiggling desperately but making no progress

layers.visual_etymology: Rising above (上) the early crowd (早) - being EMINENT and outstanding!
layers.pithy_formula: An eminent figure asks 'JWOH? Am I outstanding enough?'

characters.story: An EMINENT person rises ABOVE (上) the EARLY (早) risers, questioning with ambition: 'Zhuó? Am I outstanding enough?' That rising second tone is the constant upward aspiration of greatness - always climbing, always asking if they've reached the top!

bizarreness.sensory: Mountain peak wind, crowd looking up, spotlight from above
bizarreness.absurd_detail: Person on a literal pedestal that keeps growing taller
bizarreness.action: Shadow stretching longer than everyone else's

layers.visual_etymology: Ten days (十) of sun (日) plus moon (月) - the eternal cycle of a DYNASTY!
layers.pithy_formula: Sun and moon ask 'CHAO? How long will our dynasty last?'

characters.story: The SUN rises EARLY and the MOON follows, and together they ask: 'Cháo? How long will our DYNASTY reign?' That rising second tone is the uncertain question every empire faces - how many mornings until the end? The cycle of day and night IS the dynasty's timeline!

bizarreness.sensory: Throne room echoes, silk curtains rustling, incense for ancestors
bizarreness.absurd_detail: Sun and moon wear matching emperor crowns
bizarreness.action: Calendar pages flying off showing centuries passing

similar_warning.difference: 朝 is the base; 嘲 adds 口 (mouth) for mocking

layers.visual_etymology: Mouth (口) mocking a dynasty (朝) - to RIDICULE the rulers!
layers.pithy_formula: A mouth asks 'CHAO? You call THAT a dynasty?' mockingly.

characters.story: A MOUTH (口) looks at the DYNASTY (朝) and RIDICULES it with a mocking rise: 'Cháo? You call THAT a dynasty?' The questioning second tone drips with sarcasm - the same sound as dynasty, but now twisted into mockery!

bizarreness.sensory: Laughter echoing, finger pointing, crowd snickering
bizarreness.absurd_detail: The mouth wears a jester's hat while insulting the throne
bizarreness.action: Dynasty symbols crumbling as the mockery lands

similar_warning.difference: 嘲 adds 口 (mouth) for mocking; same pronunciation, different meaning

self_and_color.connection: From pointing at oneself to the color of purity and cleansing

direction_and_position.connection: Up, down, middle, stuck, and rising above

divination_and_fate.connection: From oracle bones to dynasties to mocking what fate brings
